caption.text:
"Sage it ain't so!"
.
This is one of those cocktails that just happen to find its way into existence based on a bit of midnight ingenuity to make for my girlfriend at the end of a long day. On the sweeter side (as requested) and fruity. Luckily this one passed the taste test! Cheers
___________
•1.5oz Grapefruit Vodka
•.5oz Lychee Liqueur
•.5oz Amaro Nonino
•1 Barspoon of Honey
•3oz Sparkling Blood Orange Soda
•Fresh Sage
.
.
Add all ingredients to shaker (except soda) stir a bit to dissolve honey. Add ice and shake. Strain into chilled coupe, top with blood orange soda and garnish with freshly clapped sage leaf. Cheers Shan! ❤️️
